thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: NexPoint Residential Trust Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.21

author: Reuters Editorial
title: NexPoint Residential Trust Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.21
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - NexPoint Residential Trust Inc:
* NEXPOINT RESIDENTIAL TRUST, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS; 2018 FULL YEAR INITIAL GUIDANCE
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.21 * Q4 REVENUE $34.9 MILLION VERSUS $32.6 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.44 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.40 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.38 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 CORE FFO PER SHARE $1.60 TO $1.71‍​ * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.67 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE BETWEEN LOSS OF $0.03 AND EARNINGS OF $0.07 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
